short_summary: The Canadian government is seeking bids for the purchase of a High Performance Computing Server and related technical specifications.
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of a High Performance Computing Server and related technical specifications. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to view and access solicitations from SSC, submit a response to a solicitation, receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations, be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments, and submit invoices and receive payment status updates. To register, please go to https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login and click Register Now.
full_summary:
====================
### Solicitation SSC-23-00021527/T

#### Overview

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a vendor capable of delivering a High Performance Computing (HPC) Server and related technical specifications.

#### Tender Details

* Solicitation Reference Number: SSC-23-00021527/T
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: BPM017952/21527
* Publication Date: 2023-01-25
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-02-15T14:00:00 (local time)
* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada (SSC)

#### Solicitation Overview

This solicitation aims to acquire a High Performance Computing (HPC) Server and related technical specifications to support the Department of National Defence (DND). The successful vendor must demonstrate their ability to meet the technical requirements outlined in the bid documentation.

#### Selection Criteria

* Bidders must be registered suppliers on the SSC supplier portal
* Bidders must provide a detailed response to the technical requirements outlined in the solicitation
* Bidders must demonstrate their ability to meet the delivery dates and technical specifications outlined in the solicitation

#### Trade Agreements

* This solicitation is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* This solicitation is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Regions of Opportunity

* National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

#### Regions of Delivery

* National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

#### Contact Information

* Name: Clara Whittaker
* Email: clara.whittaker@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-553-8354
* Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON Canada K1P 0B6

#### Attachments

The complete bid package and amendment documentation can be accessed through the SSC supplier portal.

#### Note

This solicitation announcement is for informational purposes only and does not constitute a formal invitation to participate. Bidders are responsible for ensuring they meet the applicable trade agreements, technical requirements, and delivery dates specified in the solicitation announcement.
